name: Tomato Basil Pasta
instructions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
In a separate pan, heat olive oil and saute garlic.
Add chopped tomatoes, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Toss the cooked pasta in the sauce and serve.

name: Mint Lemonade
instructions:
Boil water and steep fresh mint for 5 minutes.
Strain the mint and let the water cool.
Mix the mint water with lemon juice, honey, and ice cubes.
Serve chilled.

name: Carrot Ginger Soup
instructions:
Saute onions and ginger in a pot until softened.
Add carrots and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil.
Simmer for 20 minutes, then blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Lavender Lemon Cake
instructions:
Preheat oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C). Grease a cake pan.
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and lavender.
Add eggs, butter, and lemon juice. Mix until smooth.
Pour batter into pan and bake for 25-30 minutes.

name: Cabbage Stir Fry
instructions:
Heat sesame oil in a pan and saute garlic and ginger.
Add chopped cabbage and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and oregano. Stir and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Spinach and Garlic Saute
instructions:
Heat olive oil in a pan and saute garlic until fragrant.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Cilantro Lime Rice
instructions:
Cook rice according to package directions.
Once cooked, mix in olive oil, lime juice, and fresh cilantro.
Season with salt and serve.

name: Zucchini Fritters
instructions:
Grate zucchini and squeeze out excess water.
Mix zucchini with egg, flour, Parmesan, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan and fry spoonfuls of the mixture until golden brown.
Serve with a dipping sauce.

name: Oregano Chicken Marinade
instructions:
Mix oregano, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or cook the chicken as desired.

name: Pumpkin Soup
instructions:
Saute onion in olive oil until softened.
Add pumpkin cubes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil.
Simmer for 15 minutes, then blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve hot.

name: Fresh Garden Salad
instructions:
Chop vegetables
 mix in a bowl
 drizzle olive oil and lemon juice
 toss well
 serve
